item.title: Tue Apr 25 02:38:21 AM CDT 2023
item.description:
TueApr2502:38:21AMCDT2023

glowing.

Even as the thoughts melt away,

Carrying the hunger pains.

Carrying the hunger pains.

During the cold Spring rain,

During the cold Spring rain,

glowing.

During the cold Spring rain,

Flowing; her eyes forlorn,

Carrying the hunger pains.

Carrying the hunger pains.

The shadows glare,

Long days ahead in mind

Flowing; her eyes forlorn,

During the cold Spring rain,

Tumeric Mix

Tumeric 2 1/8 tablespoon

Cumin 1 1/2 tablespoon

Cayenne 1 1/8 teaspoon

Chilly powder 2 shotglass

Crushed peppers 1 1/8 shotglass

Garlic powder 2 shotglass

Onion powder 1/2 tablespoon

Cocao powder 1/8 teaspoon

Cocao powder 1 1/4th teaspoon
